title: Keys
description: Signing keys for JWTs used to access the API.

alg.title: Algorithm
alg.description: The specific cryptographic algorithm used with the key.

kty.title: Family
kty.description: The family of cryptographic algorithms used with the key.

use.title: Usage
use.description: How the key was meant to be used; `sig` represents the signature.

x5c.title: x.509 Chain
x5c.description: The x.509 certificate chain. The first entry in the array is the certificate to use for token verification; the other certificates can be used to verify this first certificate.

n.title: Modulus
n.description: The modulus for a standard pem.

e.title: Exponent
e.description: The exponent for a standard pem.

kid.title: Key ID
kid.description: The unique identifier for the key.

x5t.title: Thumbprint
x5t.description: The thumbprint of the x.509 cert (SHA-1 thumbprint).
